data.message: Hey Em.....you owe your fan base an apology.  Your views on politics are whatever.....but why attack your supporters personally?   Probably not the smartest move...we supported you all this time and now this😕😕😞 you've taken the fun out of the Slim Shady😕

replies.message: Yeah it's not a smart move but with some luck he might still make it. If not, carpentry is still an option.
